item.title: It's a wrap - GSoC'18
item.dc:creator: Prakhar Srivastava
item.description:
Bidding Adieu to GSoC’18

It’s here, the end of the final phase of my journey in GSoC 2018 iteration. What an amazing time it was! It was absolutely enlightening and motivating in a lot of sense. I had this great opportunity to be mentored by two marvelous mentors, nifty in their craft. I would like ...READ MORE...

item.title: Phase-3 Midway - GSoC'18
item.dc:creator: Prakhar Srivastava
item.description:
Final Level - GSoC’18

This post is to update readers on my work after the phase 2 of GSoC. So, continuing after a milestone task of making the AstroTime.jl written completely in Julia. After the 2 months long coding spree, I was able to publish the final PR, excise erfa and thus completing the majo ...READ MORE...

item.title: Phase-2 Conclusion - GSoC'18
item.dc:creator: Prakhar Srivastava
item.description:
Ending the Phase 2

So today, on the onset of evaluation period of Phase 2. I would like to update all the reader about my work from the last post. It’s officially the end of Phase 2! We’re 2/3 of the journey of GSoC but it just began! Einstein’s theory of relativity thus seems to play its role: TIM ...READ MORE...

item.title: Phase-2 Update - GSoC'18
item.dc:creator: Prakhar Srivastava
item.description: Passed the first evaluation! It was the morning of 15th June, I got up and as a habit checked my emails. There it was, a mail stating, “You’ve passed the first evaluation!”. Oh, it felt so good that I slept again, haha! Anyway, I did my first phase work near to the deadline and it was a bit due to m ...READ MORE...

item.title: Phase-1 - GSoC'18
item.dc:creator: Prakhar Srivastava
item.description:
Rounding off the Phase 1

As I’ve mentioned before that GSoC is divided into 3 phases with an addition of community bonding phase. These phases are a medium to keep a check on the project and tap on its progress. I already laid out a well planned and sequential structure for all the phases but the a ...READ MORE...

item.title: Community Bonding Period - GSoC'18
item.dc:creator: Prakhar Srivastava
item.description:
End of Community Bonding Period

May 15, 2018, marks the end of Community Bonding Period of GoogleSummerofCode’18. This period was basically focused on to make the selected participants for familiar with their mentors and community. My bonding well with the community and the mentors it would only he ...READ MORE...

item.title: GSoC'18 Journey
item.dc:creator: Prakhar Srivastava
item.description:
Tl;dr No, it’s not easy but no, it’s sure not impossible.

Things you should know

What is GSoC? What is Open Source? This blog entails my journey, it might not be the same for you!

item.title: A fortnight and a few days to go

item.description: The last procedure PR for AstroLib.jl is now open. item.description: Well, the best news to write about right now, would have been to say that I’ve completed transcribing the procedures for AstroLib.jl, my main objective for GSoC.Unfortunately, complications(read laziness) are a thing and with all the smaller monsters and minions killed (the already finished procedur ...READ MORE...
